data.title: Discover and taste Tournai
data.meta_description: Together with a professional guide, you will walk through the beautiful city of Tournai and discover its most intriguing places. Interesting stories, cultures, history and fun anecdotes are the name of the game. On top of that, we will stop to tickle your taste buds with local delicacies.
data.meta_site_name: Discover Belgium | Discover and taste Tournai
data.text:
A unique historical and culinary walking tour in Tournai

Follow the guide on a walking tour to visit Tournai and discover all the historical and culinary gems the city has to offer.

This food tour alternates interesting stories with culture, history and amusing anecdotes.

It includes a visit to a carefully selected restaurant.

The second oldest city in Belgium. The Scheldt crosses the city, green parks and relaxing fountains form a perfect harmony with Tournaiâs numerous art treasures. The Cathedral and the Belfry, both recognised by UNESCO, the Cloth Hall, the âPont des trousâ and the Museum of Fine Arts designed by Victor Horta. Simply put: beauty galore!

Visit Tournai on a walking tour with an experienced guide and discover the cityâs most fascinating and delightful places. Expect interesting stories, culture, history and amusing anecdotes. This is also a food tour: we will stop every now and then to tempt your taste buds with local delicacies. Spoil yourself with a delicious lunch prepared with local specialities at a carefully selected restaurant. Afterwards, we will continue our walking tour and end the day with a local beer and the award ceremony for the city quiz. This is a unique and unforgettable way to discover the real Tournai.

Example programme of a culinary walking tour in Tournai:

10:45: the group is welcomed by our guide

11:00: guided walking tour with stops to taste local delicacies

13:00: lunch at the restaurant

14:30: continuation of the walking tour

16:00: end of the walk with a local beer and award ceremony for the city quiz

16:30: end of the event

Duration: approximately 5,5 hours

Price: from â¬ 99 per person*

*Prices valid as from 20 participants. For groups more than 50 persons, special prices on demand. Prices exclude VAT.

Included in the price:

Walking tour in the city with a professional city guide

Two-course menu

Matching drinks: 1 glass of wine/beer/soft drinks and 1 coffee/tea

Accompaniment by our guide during the whole event

Several salty/sweet tastings

1 local beer

City quiz with a âdeliciousâ award for the winner

Organisation, coordination and logistics of the event

Additional information:

There are numerous ways to personalise this event, such as a half-day version: Sweet and sour, a tasty city walk in Tournai.

We tailor the choice of restaurants and dishes to your budget.

Send us a group request
